home.hero_title: Literally just a free database mapped to some divs.
home.hero_subtitle: Why are you paying a $10 subscription just to show off links? I coded this at 3 AM running purely on instant coffee fumes. Just take all the features for free, damn it.

features.title: It's genuinely not rocket science
features.f1_desc: Who clicks up/down arrows in 2026? I wrote a custom drag and drop handler so you can just yeet your links wherever.
features.f2_desc: To make it look like I sort of know what I'm doing, I successfully centered a div so you don't have to touch CSS.
features.f3_desc: Line goes up = dopamine. See exactly who's clicking your stuff. Don't worry, I don't judge.

auth.login_subtitle: Prove you aren't a lost bot real quick
auth.google_login: Smash this let Google handle it
auth.email_login: Or type manually like an absolute boomer
auth.no_account: Wait, you don't have an account?
auth.signup_subtitle: Hand over your data (relax, I'm too lazy to sell it)

dashboard.title: The War Room
dashboard.no_links: Wow, emptier than my soul. Drop a link already.
dashboard.soon_alert: Bro chill I haven't coded this yet, I'm still fighting CORS errors
dashboard.custom_bg_desc: Upload a custom background image. It will overlay on top of your theme's colors.
dashboard.allow_subscribers: Allow visitors to subscribe for updates

footer.copyright: © 2026 ShareLinkGan. Built at 3 AM while crying over undefined errors.
footer.terms: Legal Stuff (be honest, you won't read this)
footer.privacy: We literally couldn't care less about your data

qris_tab.title: QRIS & Donations
qris_tab.qris_desc: Upload your QRIS barcode image. Visitors can scan it with any e-wallet or banking app to send tips or payments.
qris_tab.active_desc: Your QRIS code will appear on your profile's "Support" tab
qris_tab.get_qris: Get your QRIS from your bank or e-wallet app
qris_tab.donation_desc: Add an external donation link (e.g., Saweria, Trakteer, Ko-fi, PayPal.me). This will appear as a button on your profile's Support tab alongside QRIS.
qris_tab.hw_1: Your QRIS code and donation link appear on the "Support" tab of your public profile
qris_tab.hw_2: QRIS works with all Indonesian e-wallets and banking apps
qris_tab.hw_3: Products without a checkout link or WhatsApp number will show a "Pay via QRIS" button
qris_tab.hw_4: Donation links support platforms like Saweria, Trakteer, Ko-fi, etc.

social_tab.title: Social Links
social_tab.desc: Add your social media profiles here. These icons will appear beautifully at the bottom of your profile page. Just enter your username or phone number, and we'll handle the links automatically!
social_tab.pt_1: For WhatsApp, use country code e.g. 628... instead of 08... (no + sign).
social_tab.pt_2: For other apps, just type your exact username without the @ symbol unless specified.
social_tab.pt_3: We only show social icons that you have explicitly filled out.

shop_tab.title: Shop Products
shop_tab.no_products: No products yet. Add physical or digital products to sell to your audience.

profile_page.scan_desc: Scan this QRIS code with any e-wallet or banking app.
profile_page.enter_pin_link: Enter the PIN to access this link.
profile_page.enter_pin_post: Enter the PIN to read this post.
profile_page.sensitive_desc: This profile has been marked as containing sensitive or adult material. You must be 18+ to proceed.
